item.description:
It's always good to go over the basics of studio lighting and setting up backdrops.  This meetup is for less experienced studio photographers wanting to learn the basics.

We'll cover:

1. High key setup
2. Low key setup
3. Light modifiers such as the soft box, beauty dish, grids, gels, and scrim.
4. Ring flash lighting


IMPORTANT
You need to have a camera that has a hot shoe that can accept the Pocket Wizard radio trigger. This is most digital SLR cameras except for Sony. Also, bonus if your camera has a PC jack. Bring your camera manual in case we need to refer to it. Sony users can come if you have a Sony flash.

You'll also need to know how to set your camera to manual shooting mode.

The meetup event fee is $35, which covers instruction, studio rental, and model's fee.

Our first model is Dakota.

 

 

 

We have a second model to be announced shortly.
item.name: Intro. to Studio Lighting
